Machine Learning Cheat sheet

A comprehensive guide covering various machine learning concepts, including linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and more. It also touches upon popular libraries, data preprocessing techniques, model evaluation metrics, hyperparameter tuning methods, and commonly used functions.

Key Concepts:

  • Basic concepts in Machine Learning
  • Data preprocessing techniques
  • Model evaluation metrics
  • Hyperparameter tuning methods
  • Deep learning concepts
  • GRU vs LSTM
  • Model training functions
